title: High‑detail tattoos in Tampa
subtitle: Online booking and aftercare with protective film (Saniderm/Emalla).
whatsapp_message: Hi! I want to book a tattoo. Date: [MM/DD], Size/placement: [details].
aftercare: Wash hands before touching the area.
Keep protective film on for 7 days (Saniderm/Emalla).
If excess plasma builds up, replace film within 24–48 hours.
Avoid pool/sauna/sun exposure during the 7 days.
After removing on day 7, wash gently, pat dry, apply thin layer of cream 2–3×/day for a week.
